Uses of Interface
org.gridgain.grid.GridMetadataAware

Packages that use GridMetadataAware
org.gridgain.grid  Start Here  Contains main Compute Grid APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache  Start Here  Contains main Data Grid APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.datastructures Contains distributed data structures that work on top of data grid. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.query Contains query related public classes and interfaces. 
org.gridgain.grid.events Contains various events emitted by GridGain. 
org.gridgain.grid.gridify Contains APIs utilized for AOP-based grid-enabling. 
org.gridgain.grid.lang Contains general language constructs and functional APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger Contains logging functionality used throughout the system. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.java Contains Java logging implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.jboss Contains JBoss implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.jcl Contains Jakarta commons logging implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.log4j Contains Log4j implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.slf4j Contains SLF4J implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.tomcat Contains Tomcat implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi Contains common classes and interfaces for SPI implementations. 
org.gridgain.grid.typedef Contains typedefs definitions for frequently used classes. 
 

Uses of GridMetadataAware in org.gridgain.grid
 

Subinterfaces of GridMetadataAware in org.gridgain.grid
 interface Grid
          Start Here  Main Compute Grid APIs.
 interface GridEvent
          Grid events are used for notification about what happens within the grid.
 interface GridFuture<R>
          Extension for standard Future interface.
 interface GridJobContext
          Context attached to every job executed on the grid.
 interface GridJobSibling
          Job sibling interface defines a job from the same split.
 interface GridLoadBalancer
          Load balancer is used for finding the best balanced node according to load balancing policy.
 interface GridNode
          Interface representing a single grid node.
 interface GridNodeLocal<K,V>
          Defines interface for node-local storage.
 interface GridNodeShadow
          When a grid node leaves the topology it leaves a shadow.
 interface GridProjection
          Defines grid projection interface and monadic set of operations on a set of grid nodes.
 interface GridRichNode
          Defines a "rich" node as a single node-based grid projection.
 interface GridScheduleFuture<R>
          Future for cron-based scheduled execution.
 interface GridTaskFuture<R>
          This class defines a handler for asynchronous task execution.
 interface GridTaskSession
          Defines a distributed session for particular task execution.
